Tobacco Company Bruce A. Cook National Manager-Trade Issues Winston-Salem, N.C. 27102 910-741-7507 December 4, 1997 To: Colleen Coyle Don P. Fitzgerald I'm enclosing some information regarding New Jersey. We're expecting a cigarette tax proposal of 25 cents per pack. We'll be making phone calls to retailers and smokers to urge them to voice opposition to the increase, but would also appreciate any help that sales can provide in activating retailers and distributors. The information provided includes: • New Jersey Cigarette Tax Overview • A newspaper article titled "Trenton's Looking At New Taxes" • Morning Team Notes 12/4 • Target List - State Legislators that should be contacted. If sales can help, please distribute any of the items above that are deemed appropriate to regional personnel. They in turn can share this with appropriate division personnel. Thank you. Sincerely, Suce Bruce A. Cook
